html:
2026-0004
2026-01-09DFOFinancial Administration ActOrder directing the Freshwater Fish Marketing Corporation to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework Order directing the Freshwater Fish Marketing Corporation to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.N/A
subject: Order directing the Freshwater Fish Marketing Corporation to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework
precis: Order directing the Freshwater Fish Marketing Corporation to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.
